pr_title: feat: Add endpoint for fetching app hub url

timeline.bodyText: It seems AppManager.getAppStoreUrl returns a String already, do we need to cast to String here?
timeline.author: larshelge

replies.bodyText: Good point, no we don't I'll remove the cast.
replies.author: erikarenhill

timeline.bodyText: If AppHub is the new official term, could we rename the method AppManager.getAppStoreUrl to getAppHubUrl ?
timeline.author: larshelge

replies.bodyText: Yes it should be named apphub through the entire code base, I was thinking the full code base rename could be in a separate PR but maybe its just better to get it done all at once. I can have a look, since it would be affecting configuration (dhis.conf) and lots of other places as well.
replies.author: erikarenhill

timeline.message: feat: add endpoint for fetching appstore url

refactor: change name of endpoint to use apphub

since its named app hub now instead of app store I think the endpoint should be named app hub, then we can change all the other internal naming later on without pointing towards a new endpoint from the app management app.
